original_text: “When the kings of the earth who committed adultery with her and shared her luxury see the smoke of her burning, they will weep and mourn over her.
korean_text: 그와 함께 음행하고 사치하던 땅의 왕들이 그가 불타는 연기를 보고 위하여 울고 가슴을 치며

sentences.original_text: When the kings of the earth
see the smoke of her burning
they will weep and mourn over her
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀를 위해 울며 슬퍼할 것이다
